item.title: Book Club Announcement: Smalltalk Best Practice Patterns with Kent Beck
item.dc:creator: chuck@teachmetocode.com (Charles Max Wood)
item.description: Our small Ruby podcast has been overrun by the likes of Josh Susser, who this month chose Smalltalk Best Practice Patterns by Kent Beck as our Book Club for next month. We’ll be recording the podcast on Tuesday, October 4th at 9:30AM Mountain Time. Kent will be joining us for that episode. If you have [...]
item.content:encoded:
Our small Ruby podcast has been overrun by the likes of Josh Susser, who this month chose Smalltalk Best Practice Patterns by Kent Beck as our Book Club for next month.

We’ll be recording the podcast on Tuesday, October 4th at 9:30AM Mountain Time.

Kent will be joining us for that episode.

If you have questions you’d like to ask Kent or comments about the book, leave a comment and we’ll cover it during the show.
